item.title: "This Is Terribly Unprofessional": Ridley Scott Recalls Joaquin Phoenix Trying To Quit Gladiator Mid-Filming
item.description: Director Ridley Scott recalls the shocking moment when Joaquin Phoenix attempted to quit Gladiator when the 2000 epic movie was already filming.

item.title: The 4 Succession Candidates For Disney CEO After Bob Iger, Explained
item.description: Disney boss Bob Iger is slated to remove his Mickey Sorcerer Hat sometime in early 2026. Here's who could be replacing him.

item.title: Does Heretic Have A Post-Credits Scene?
item.description: A Quiet Place's writers created a new, religious horror movie that looks standalone, but does Heretic have a post-credits scene teasing more to come?
